recipe_name: Fuyu Persimmon and Burrata Caprese Salad
ingredients: 1  Fuyu persimmon, stem removed and sliced into rounds, 1 (4 ounce) ball burrata cheese, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons balsamic glaze, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil, 5 leaves fresh basil, or more to taste, 1 pinch freshly ground black pepper
nutrition: Total Fat 16g 20%, Saturated Fat 9g 43%, Cholesterol 40mg 13%, Sodium 140mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 6g 2%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 9mg 43%, Calcium 8mg 1%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 49mg 1%
